name: Automated Collection Command Prompt
description: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.
query: (process.command_line:(/.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc].*/ OR /.*\.[Dd][Oo][Cc][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss].*/ OR /.*\.[Xx][Ll][Ss][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Pp][Tt].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Pp][Tt][Xx].*/ OR /.*\.[Rr][Tt][Ff].*/ OR /.*\.[Pp][Dd][Ff].*/ OR /.*\.[Tt][Xx][Tt].*/) AND ((process.command_line:/.*[Dd][Ii][Rr]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Bb]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Ss]\ .*/) OR (process.pe.original_file_name:/[Ff][Ii][Nn][Dd][Ss][Tt][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:(/.*\ \/[Ee]\ .*/ OR /.*\ \/[Ss][Ii]\ .*/))))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:(*.doc* OR *.docx* OR *.xls* OR *.xlsx* OR *.ppt* OR *.pptx* OR *.rtf* OR *.pdf* OR *.txt*) AND ((process.command_line:*dir\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/b\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/s\ *) OR (process.pe.original_file_name:FINDSTR.EXE AND process.command_line:(*\ \/e\ * OR *\ \/si\ *))))`
